Label: CaMKII dodecamer
Comment: CaMKII is composed of a homo or hetero dodecamer of four subunits apha, beta, delta and gamma. In a heteromultimer the ratio of alpha to beta may vary from 6;1, 3:1 or 1:1.

Label: activated PDE1B
Comment: Can hydrolyze both cAMP and cGMP

Label: activated PDE1A
Comment: Can hydrolyze both cAMP and cGMP

Label: PDE1B
Comment: Can hydrolyze both cAMP and cGMP

Label: PDE1A
Comment: Can hydrolyze both cAMP and cGMP
